fields.fieldTitle: What exactly is the event? (1-2 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This event is a/an _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: mastermind meeting; webinar; dance; live seminar, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What type of event is it?

fieldHint.hint1: "This event is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Exclusive, New, Free, Premium, Members-Only, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is the name of the event?

fieldHint.hint1: "The name of this event is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: (Ex: Dance Under The Stars, The Founder's Club Meeting, Millionaire Mastermind, Millennium Club Annual Meeting, etc.)

fieldHint.hint3: TIP: Use the Profitable Title Scripts to come up with a great title for your event!

fields.fieldTitle: What is the tagline of the event?

fieldHint.hint1: "The tagline of this event is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: How to put your email marketing on auto-pilot!; Make this the best year ever; Have the time of your life; dance the night away under the stars; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Your Name

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Jim Edwards

fields.fieldTitle: What is the focus of the event in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint1: "The focus of this event is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Automatic Email Marketing; marketing mastermind; 90's rock celebration, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Event Date?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Thursday, Dec. 24, 2024

fields.fieldTitle: Event Time?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 7:00 p.m. Eastern

fields.fieldTitle: What's the top problem they face in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "The top problem they face in this area is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: How to get your email marketing set up to run automatically

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 thing they want from this event?

fieldHint.hint1: "My target audience really wants to ______." Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: discover the specific mechanics of setting up an automatic email autoresponder campaign; have a great time; put your ebook marketing on the fast track, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's their #1 fear they want to avoid at all costs?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience is really afraid of _____." Starts with a VERB ending in "ING"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Getting stuck with all the complicated technical details of setting things up; spending another night at home alone in front of the TV, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the "Big Picture" Payoff of this event?

fieldHint.hint1: "This event means you'll be able to______." Starts with VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: set your email marketing on auto-pilot AND on steroids at the same time; enjoy a wonderful night out with friends; sell more books on Amazon on autopilot, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: #1 Big Benefit of being at the event

fieldHint.hint1: "You'll also be able to _____!" Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build a free or paid newsletter to increase your sales; meet new people, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: #2 Big Benefit of being at the event

fieldHint.hint1: "You'll also be able to _____!" Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build a big, profitable email list; have a great time, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: #3 Big Benefit of being at the event

fieldHint.hint1: "You'll also be able to _____!" Starts with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: increase your "stick rate" on sales on everything from big-ticket items to even the humblest "ebook!"; forget your worries for a night, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's a cool thing that could happen for them at the event?

fieldHint.hint1: "And you just might even _______!"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: discover how to turn an autoresponder into a monthly cash-flow source by creating a "Simple, Sequential Membership Site!"; make some new friends, etc.
